Reidmar

Location
Prospero's Dream
Loyalty
17

Reidmar is a legendary pilot and union representative, widely known on the Dream for his unwavering loyalty and gruff exterior. Born on a remote colony planet, Reidmar developed a love for flying at an early age, and quickly earned a reputation as one of the most skilled pilots in the cluster. He later became involved with the Teamster Local 32819L, and rose through the ranks to become a union representative known for his tough negotiating tactics and willingness to stand up for his fellow workers.
